Sentencas: Improving the sluggish oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) is vital to enable the commercialization of some high-temperature clean-energy devices.
Titulo: A Highly Stable and Active Hybrid Cathode for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Silver (Ag) is usually decorated onto the surface of electrodes to enhance ORR activity.
Titulo: A Highly Stable and Active Hybrid Cathode for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: However, the thermal instability of Ag causes the deactivation of ORR on coarsened particles under operating conditions.
Titulo: A Highly Stable and Active Hybrid Cathode for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Here, we introduce a SrSc0.175Nb0.025Co0.8O3- (SSNC) perovskite hybrid cathode decorated with Ag@CeO2 core-shell spheres, which shows an extremely high performance for the ORR.
Titulo: A Highly Stable and Active Hybrid Cathode for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Its area-specific resistance is just 0.24cm(2) at 500 degrees C, and it works stably under a cathodic polarization at 600 degrees C for over 110h, without detectable performance deterioration.
Titulo: A Highly Stable and Active Hybrid Cathode for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Electron microscopy reveals that the Ag cores remain isolated even after heating the catalyst to 800 degrees C.
Titulo: A Highly Stable and Active Hybrid Cathode for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The design concept in this work can be extended to prevent the aggregation of other metallic electrocatalysts working at high temperatures.
Titulo: A Highly Stable and Active Hybrid Cathode for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
